mapper.insert: insert into t_order_address (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, OPENID, ADDRESS, NAME, TEL, ISDEFAULT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_order_address set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OPENID = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEFAULT = #{isdefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, OPENID, ADDRESS, NAME, TEL, ISDEFAULT from t_order_address where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, ISDELETED, OPENID, ADDRESS, NAME, TEL, ISDEFAULT from t_order_address
